name: Deus Ex: The Conspiracy
description:
Deus Ex: The Conspiracy is an action game. It was originally released in 2002. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Deus Ex: The Conspiracy is available on PlayStation 2.
Warren Spector produced the game. It was directed by Warren Spector. It was scored by Alexander Brandon, Dan Gardopée and Michiel van den Bos.
